title: New: Mononoke – Bones & Glory
body:
And this is precisely why Liverpool songstress **Mononoke** is being tipped as one of the breakthrough acts of 2014.

Having impressed last year with the magically elegant _Alice_, pop’s future princess returns with **Bones & Glory**, a sort of Lana Del Rey meets Lorde ballad, it’s divinely composed. Coming with eerie, haunting visuals, this is the sort of track that inspires obsessions.
